book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ....... ⲥⲗⲁⲁⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ .... ⲛⲅ̅ϩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ.
English: Beware thou slide not by it, lest thou fall before him that lieth in wait.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲓⲣⲉ ............ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϥⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: He that is merciful will lend unto his neighbour; and he that strengtheneth his hand keepeth the commandments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲉⲧϥ̅ⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲛ ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲧⲉ.
English: Lend to thy neighbour in time of his need, and pay thou thy neighbour again in due season.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: Keep thy word, and deal faithfully with him, and thou shalt always find the thing that is necessary for thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ϩⲁϩ ⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲓⲙⲏⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϯϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲃⲟⲏⲑⲓ ⲛⲁⲩ.
English: Many, when a thing was lent them, reckoned it to be found, and put them to trouble that helped them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϥϯⲡⲓ ⲉⲛⲉϥϭⲓϫ ϣⲁⲛⲧϥ̅ϫⲓ: ⲛϥ̅ⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲥⲙⲏ ϩⲓ ⲛⲉⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ.
English: Till he hath received, he will kiss a man’s hand; and for his neighbour’s money he will speak submissly:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲁⲩ ϣⲁϥⲧⲁⲗⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈: ⲛϥ̅ϫⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ϭⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: but when he should repay, he will prolong the time, and return words of grief, and complain of the time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϣⲁⲛϭⲙ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲙⲟⲅⲓⲥ ϣⲁϥϫⲓ ⲧⲡⲁϣⲉ.
English: If he prevail, he shall hardly receive the half, and he will count as if he had found it:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲛ ϣⲁϥϩⲟⲩⲣⲱⲱϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲛϥ̅ⲕⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲓⲛϫⲏ.
English: if not, he hath deprived him of his money, and he hath gotten him an enemy without cause: he payeth him with cursings and railings;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϣⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲱϣ.
English: and for honour he will pay him disgrace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲕⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ: ⲁⲩⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩϥⲟϭⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϫⲓⲛϫⲏ.
English: Many therefore have refused to lend for other men’s ill dealing, fearing to be defrauded.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲗⲏⲛ ⲁⲣⲓ ϩⲁⲣϣ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲏⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅...... ⲛⲁ.
English: Yet have thou patience with a man in poor estate, and delay not to shew him mercy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣ.......... ϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥϭⲣⲱϩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲧⲟϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϥϣⲟⲩⲉⲓⲧ.
English: Help the poor for the commandment’s sake, and turn him not away because of his poverty.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉϫ ϩⲟⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲥⲟⲛ ϩⲓ ϣⲃⲏⲣ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲧⲣⲉⲩ ⲣ̅ϣⲏⲃⲉ ϩⲁ ⲡⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ.
English: Lose thy money for thy brother and thy friend, and let it not rust under a stone to be lost.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁ ⲡⲉⲕⲁϩⲟ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲛⲟϥⲣⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲩⲃ.
English: Lay up thy treasure according to the commandments of the most High, and it shall bring thee more profit than gold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲉⲩϩ ⲛⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲛⲉⲕⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲧⲟⲩϫⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ
English: Shut up alms in thy storehouses: and it shall deliver thee from all affliction.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲡⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲗ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϭⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲣⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲉϫⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲁϫⲉ.
English: It shall fight for thee against thine enemies better than a mighty shield and strong spear.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲥ ϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲧϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲕⲁⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ.
English: An honest man is surety for his neighbour: but he that is impudent will forsake him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ: ⲁϥϯ ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲁⲣⲟⲕ.
English: Forget not the friendship of thy surety, for he hath given his life for thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲧϩⲙⲟⲧ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ...... ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲁϥⲛⲁϩⲙⲉϥ.
English: A sinner will overthrow the good estate of his surety: (17) And he that is of an unthankful mind will leave him in danger that delivered him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ⲧⲁⲕⲉ ⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲉⲩⲥⲟⲩⲧⲱⲛ ........................... ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ
English: Suretiship hath undone many of good estate, and shaken them as a wave of the sea:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥ........ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲩⲛⲁⲧⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲡⲗⲁⲛⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲉⲛⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩ ⲁⲛ ⲛⲉ.
English: mighty men hath it driven from their houses, so that they wandered among strange nations.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉϥⲉϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉϥϣⲡ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲡⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ϩⲉⲛⲉⲣⲅⲟⲗⲁⲃⲓⲁ ⲙⲁⲣⲉϥϩⲉ ⲉⲩϫⲓϩⲁⲡ.
English: A wicked man transgressing the commandments of the Lord shall fall into suretiship: and he that undertaketh and followeth other men’s business for gain shall fall into suits.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ϯϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϩⲉ.
English: Help thy neighbour according to thy power, and beware that thou thyself fall not into the same.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲧⲏⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲉϥϩⲱⲃⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: The chief thing for life is water, and bread, and clothing, and an house to cover shame.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲧϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲏϩ ϩⲁ ⲧⲟⲩⲉϩⲥⲟⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲏⲓ̈ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ϩⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲟⲟⲙ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲉⲙⲡⲱⲕ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ.
English: Better is the life of a poor man in a mean cottage, than delicate fare in another man’s house.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕⲧⲏⲕ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲕϥ̅.
English: Be it little or much, hold thee contented, that thou hear not the reproach of thy house.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩ ϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲉⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲉϣⲟⲩⲱⲛ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ.
English: For it is a miserable life to go from house to house: for where thou art a stranger, thou darest not open thy mouth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϥϯⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲥⲉⲓⲟ ......ⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ϣⲁϥⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉϩⲉⲛϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲩⲛⲁϣⲧ̅.
English: Thou shalt entertain, and feast, and have no thanks: moreover thou shalt hear bitter words:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲁⲙⲟⲩ ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϣϭⲟⲣ ⲙⲁⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲟⲩⲧⲣⲁⲡⲉⲍⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲧⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲕϥ̅.
English: Come, thou stranger, and furnish a table, and feed me of that thou hast ready.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲃⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϣϭⲟⲣ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲧⲁⲉⲓⲏⲩ: ⲁ ⲡⲁⲥⲟⲛ ϭⲟⲉⲓⲗⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ϯⲣ̅ⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲏⲓ̈.
English: Give place, thou stranger, to an honourable man; my brother cometh to be lodged, and I have need of mine house.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ϩⲟⲣϣ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲡⲓⲧⲓⲙⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲇⲁⲛⲓⲥⲧⲏⲥ. ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ.
English: These things are grievous to a man of understanding; the upbraiding of houseroom, and reproaching of the lender.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲁϣⲉ ϩⲓⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϩⲁⲏ.
English: He that loveth his son causeth him oft to feel the rod, that he may have joy of him in the end.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ϥⲛⲁϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲓⲱⲱϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: He that chastiseth his son shall have joy in him, and shall rejoice of him among his acquaintance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲕⲱϩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲉⲗⲏⲗ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϣⲃⲉⲉⲣ.
English: He that teacheth his son grieveth the enemy: and before his friends he shall rejoice of him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣϣⲁⲛ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲙⲟⲩ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲙⲟⲩ ϫⲉ ⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: Though his father die, yet he is as though he were not dead: for he hath left one behind him that is like himself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲁϥⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ .... ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩ.
English: While he lived, he saw and rejoiced in him: and when he died, he was not sorrowful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲕⲃⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϣⲃⲉⲉⲣ.
English: He left behind him an avenger against his enemies, and one that shall requite kindness to his friends.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩⲣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲁϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϣⲁⲛϩⲧⲏϥ ⲛⲁϣⲧⲟⲣⲧⲣ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲁϣⲕⲁⲕ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅.
English: He that maketh too much of his son shall bind up his wounds; and his bowels will be troubled at every cry.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϩⲧⲟ ⲉⲙⲡⲟⲩⲥⲟⲙϥ̅ ⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϥⲛⲁϣⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲉⲁⲩⲕⲁ ϫⲏⲣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϥⲁⲥⲱⲟⲩ.
English: An horse not broken becometh headstrong: and a child left to himself will be wilful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲉⲡϣⲡ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥϣⲧⲣ̅ⲧⲱⲣⲕ̅: ⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥϯⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲛⲁⲕ.
English: Cocker thy child, and he shall make thee afraid: play with him, and he will bring thee to heaviness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲕⲙ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϫⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ϯ ⲛⲟⲩϣⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲁⲏ.
English: Laugh not with him, lest thou have sorrow with him, and lest thou gnash thy teeth in the end.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲛⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈.
English: Give him no liberty in his youth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲗⲱϫϩ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲥⲡⲓⲣⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲛϩⲟⲥⲟⲛ ⲉⲩⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲡⲉ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲣ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅.
English: Beat his sides while he is still young, lest becoming stubborn, he disobey thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ϫⲉⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϫⲓ ϫⲣⲟⲡ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: Train up thy son, and exercise him with work, lest by thy looseness thou stumble. (13a) And overlook not his ignorance. (13b) Bow down his neck in his youth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲧⲛ̅ ⲉϥϭⲙ̅ϭⲟⲙ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲉϥϣⲱⲛⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲱⲙⲁ.
English: Better is the poor, being sound and strong of constitution, than a rich man that is afflicted in his body.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲟⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲧⲛ̅ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥ̅ ⲁⲣⲏϫⲥ̅.
English: Health and good estate of body are above all gold, and a strong body above infinite wealth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲁⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲟⲩⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲟϫ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲉⲡⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲧ.
English: There is no riches above a sound body, and no joy above the joy of the heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲟⲩϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉⲟⲩϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲉϥⲙⲏⲛ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ. ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲙ.
English: Death is better than a bitter life or continual sickness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲫⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲉⲩⲡⲁϩⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲉⲥϣⲟⲧⲙ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲟⲟⲙ ⲉⲩϩⲟⲣϭ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲫⲟⲥ;
English: Delicates poured upon a mouth shut up are as messes of meat set upon a grave.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲧⲁⲗⲟ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲇⲱⲗⲟⲛ; ⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙⲉϥⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲙⲉϥϣⲱⲗⲙ̅: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ... ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: What good doeth the offering unto an idol? for neither can it eat nor smell: so is he that is persecuted of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ ⲉϥⲁϣⲁϩⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲓⲟⲩⲣ ⲉϥϩⲟⲗϭ̅ ⲉⲩⲡⲁⲣⲑⲉⲛⲟⲥ ⲉϥⲁϣⲁϩⲟⲙ.
English: He seeth with his eyes and groaneth, as an eunuch that embraceth a virgin and sigheth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲑⲗⲓⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: Give not over thy mind to heaviness, and afflict not thyself in thine own counsel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲧⲉⲗⲏⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲁϩⲉ.
English: The gladness of the heart is the life of man, and the joyfulness of a man prolongeth his days.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲗ̅ⲥⲗ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛⲅ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲕⲁⲗⲉⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ:
English: Love thine own soul, and comfort thy heart, remove sorrow far from thee:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲧⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲁⲕⲉ ϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲥ̅.
English: for sorrow hath killed many, and there is no profit therein.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲧⲥ̅ⲃⲕⲉ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: Envy and wrath shorten the life, and carefulness bringeth age before the time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲣⲓⲧ ϩⲓⲡⲁϩⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϫⲱⲱⲗⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲓ̈ⲙⲉϩ ⲧⲁϩⲣⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲱⲱⲗⲉ ⲁⲓ̈ⲡⲱϩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: I awaked up last of all, as one that gathereth after the grapegatherers: by the blessing of the Lord I profited, and filled my winepress like a gatherer of grapes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲛⲁⲩ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲓ̈ϣⲡ̅ϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲙⲁⲩⲁⲁⲧ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ.
English: Consider that I laboured not for myself only, but for all them that seek learning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ⲛⲁⲡⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲥⲓⲁ ϫⲓⲥⲙⲏ.
English: Hear me, O ye great men of the people, and hearken with your ears, ye rulers of the congregation.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯϩⲧⲟⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕⲥⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲕⲟⲛϩ̅: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲛⲉⲕⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲕⲉⲟⲩⲁ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲕⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧⲟⲩ.
English: Give not thy son and wife, thy brother and friend, power over thee while thou livest, and give not thy goods to another: lest it repent thee, and thou intreat for the same again.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲛϩⲟⲥⲟⲛ ⲉⲕⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲩⲛ̅ ⲛⲓϥⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲕ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: As long as thou livest and hast breath in thee, give not thyself over to any.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲧⲟⲃϩⲕ̅ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ.
English: For better it is that thy children should seek to thee, than that thou shouldest stand to their courtesy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲧⲱⲗⲙ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲁⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϯ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩ.
English: In all thy works keep to thyself the preeminence; leave not a stain in thine honour. (32) At the time when thou shalt end thy days, and finish thy life, distribute thine inheritance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲧⲱϩ ϩⲓ ϭⲉⲣⲱⲃ ϩⲓ ⲉⲧⲡⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲃⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ.
English: Fodder, a wand, and burdens, are for the ass; and bread, correction, and work, for a servant.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓϩⲱⲃ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ: ⲃⲉϣ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲛⲁϥ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛⲥⲁ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ϩⲉ.
English: If thou set thy servant to labour, thou shalt find rest: but if thou let him go idle, he shall seek liberty.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲁϩⲃ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩⲥ ⲕⲗ̅ϫ ⲟⲩⲙⲁⲕϩ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲟⲭⲥ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲥⲁⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: A yoke and a collar do bow the neck: so are tortures and torments for an evil servant.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲟϫϥ̅ ⲉⲩϩⲱⲃ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲱⲥϥ̅: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲟⲩⲱⲥϥ̅ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲟ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁⲕⲓⲁ.
English: Send him to labour, that he be not idle; for idleness teacheth much evil.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲟϫϥ̅ ⲉⲩϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲩⲣⲟϥ: ⲉϥⲧⲙ̅ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲙⲁⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲥ: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲁϫⲛ̅ ϫⲛⲟⲩⲕ.
English: Set him to work, as is fit for him: if he be not obedient, put on more heavy fetters. (38) But be not excessive toward any; and without discretion do nothing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲙⲁⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ ⲧⲉⲕϩⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲕⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲛⲟϥ.
English: If thou have a servant, let him be unto thee as thyself, because thou hast bought him with a price.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲁⲛⲓϥ ⲛⲉⲙⲁⲕ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲱⲥ ⲥⲟⲛ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲙⲟⲣϥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ.
English: If thou have a servant, entreat him as a brother: for thou hast need of him, as of thine own soul:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ⲑⲙ̅ⲕⲟϥ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲛϥ̅ⲡⲱⲧ: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕⲛⲁϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲁϣ ⲛ̅ϩⲓⲏ;
English: if thou entreat him evil, and he run from thee, which way wilt thou go to seek him?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ϩⲉⲗⲡⲓⲥ ⲉⲩϣⲟⲩⲉⲓⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ϭⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲣⲁⲥⲟⲩ ϯⲁⲥⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲑⲏⲧ.
English: The hopes of a man void of understanding are vain and false: and dreams lift up fools.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲁⲓ̈ⲃⲉⲥ ⲉⲧⲡⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ϩⲉⲛⲧⲏⲩ ⲑⲟⲣⲁⲥⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲁⲥⲟⲩ.
English: Whoso regardeth dreams is like him that catcheth at a shadow, and followeth after the wind.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛ ⲉⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲟ ⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲟ.
English: The vision of dreams is the resemblance of one thing to another, even as the likeness of a face to a face.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲁϩⲙ̅; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϫⲓⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡϭⲟⲗ;
English: Of an unclean thing what can be cleansed? and from that thing which is false what truth can come?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲛⲧⲛ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϫⲓⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲁⲥⲟⲩ ϣⲟⲩⲉⲓⲧ .......... ⲛⲁⲁⲕⲉ.
English: Divinations, and soothsayings, and dreams, are vain: and the heart fancieth, as a woman’s heart in travail.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲟⲩⲥⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲁⲛ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲛⲉ ϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ.
English: If they be not sent from the most High in thy visitation, set not thy heart upon them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲣⲁⲥⲟⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲗⲁⲛⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: For dreams have deceived many, and they have failed that put their trust in them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲁⲩϫⲉⲕ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁϫⲛ̅ ϭⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ.
English: The law shall be found perfect without lies: and wisdom is perfection to a faithful mouth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ ϣⲁϥⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϫⲛ̅ⲧ ϩⲁϩ ϣⲁϥϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ.
English: A man that hath travelled knoweth many things; and he that hath much experience will declare wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϫⲟⲛⲧϥ̅ ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲙⲟⲩϣⲧ̅ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϣⲁϥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: He that hath no experience knoweth little: but he that hath travelled is full of prudence.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲓ̈ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉϩⲁϩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲁ ⲙⲟⲩϣⲧ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: When I travelled, I saw many things; and I understand more than I can express.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ⲁⲓ̈ϭⲓⲛⲇⲩⲛⲉⲩⲉ ϣⲁ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲓ̈ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈.
English: I was ofttimes in danger of death: yet I was delivered because of these things.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲡⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁⲱⲛϩ̅: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲩϩⲉⲗⲡⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲓ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ.
English: The spirit of those that fear the Lord shall live; for their hope is in him that saveth them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ .... ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲣ̅ϭⲱⲃ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲉϥϩⲉⲗⲡⲓⲥ.
English: Whoso feareth the Lord shall not fear nor be afraid; for he is his hope.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲧⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ: ⲉϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲛⲓⲙ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ;
English: Blessed is the soul of him that feareth the Lord: to whom doth he look? and who is his strength?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲙⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ: ⲧⲛⲁϣⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩϭⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲛⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ:
English: For the eyes of the Lord are upon them that love him, he is their mighty protection and strong stay, a defence from heat, and a cover from the sun at noon, a preservation from stumbling, and an help from falling.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲉⲩϩⲉⲗⲡⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲁⲩⲙⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲑⲁⲓ̈ⲃⲉⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉⲉⲣⲉ

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉⲛⲉⲩⲃⲁⲗ ⲉϥϯ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲙⲟⲩ.
English: He raiseth up the soul, and lighteneth the eyes: he giveth health, life, and blessing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲉⲥϫⲁϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁⲗⲟ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲉϥⲟⲩⲉϣ ⲡϫⲱϩⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲁⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ.
English: He that sacrificeth of a thing wrongfully gotten, his offering is ridiculous; and the gifts of unjust men are not accepted.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲟⲩⲉϣ ⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ.
English: The most High is not pleased with the offerings of the wicked; neither is he pacified for sin by the multitude of sacrifices.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲕⲉ ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲉϥϭⲣⲱϩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲡⲉ: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϩⲟⲩⲣⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲛⲟϥ ⲡⲉ.
English: The bread of the needy is their life: he that defraudeth him thereof is a man of blood.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁⲗⲟ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛϩⲩⲥⲓⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϣⲱⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓⲱⲧ.
English: Whoso bringeth an offering of the goods of the poor doeth as one that killeth the son before his father’s eyes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲱⲧⲃ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϥⲓ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: He that taketh away his neighbour’s living slayeth him;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϥⲉϭ ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲃⲉⲕⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲃⲉⲕⲉ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲡⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲛⲟϥ.
English: and he that defraudeth the labourer of his hire is a bloodshedder.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥⲕⲱⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥϣⲟⲣϣⲣ̅: ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ϩⲓⲥⲉ;
English: When one buildeth, and another pulleth down, what profit have they then but labour?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥⲥⲁϩⲟⲩ: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲛⲓⲙ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ;
English: When one prayeth, and another curseth, whose voice will the Lord hear?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉⲁϥϩⲟⲣⲡϥ̅ ⲉⲩⲕⲱⲱⲥ ⲛϥ̅ⲕⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲛϥ̅ϫⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲫⲏⲩ ϫⲉ ⲁϥϩⲟⲣⲡϥ̅;
English: He that washeth himself after the touching of a dead body, if he touch it again, what availeth his washing?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲛⲏⲥⲧⲉⲩⲉ ϩⲁ ⲛⲉϥⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲛ ⲉϥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲉϥϣⲗⲏⲗ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲫⲏⲩ ϫⲉ ⲁϥⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲟϥ;
English: So is it with a man that fasteth for his sins, and goeth again, and doeth the same: who will hear his prayer? or what doth his humbling profit him?
